item.title: Data-Oriented Design with Scriptable Objects
item.description: Data-oriented Design # I think one of the best introductions to pragmatic data-oriented design is the 2017 talk that Ryan Hipple gave at the Unity Connect conference. It also introduces the basics of ScriptableObjects. After you have watched the above video, I recommend checking out the asset ScriptableObject-Architecture on the asset store. It’s an implementation of the ideas of the above talk, but really nicely done. It’s open source too.
